mapper.insert: insert into customercenter values(#{center_category}, default, #{center_title}, curdate(), #{center_contents}, '', #{center_id}, '', '');
mapper.update: update product set product_name=#{product_name}, product_category=#{product_category}, product_price=#{product_price}, product_color=#{product_color}, product_file=#{product_file}, product_img=#{product_img}, product_detailimg=#{product_detailimg}, product_contents=#{product_contents} where product_name=#{check};

update customercenter set center_title=#{center_title}, center_contents=#{center_contents}, center_date=curdate() where center_no=#{center_no};
